src_original: api tu sukhasaṃjñāmeva kṛtvā /  sarvasattvānāmantike mātṛsaṃjñāṃ pitṛsaṃjñāṃ putrasaṃjñāṃ duhitṛsaṃjñāṃ kṛtvā strīpuruṣeṣu /  evametāḥ saṃjñāḥ kṛtvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvacārikāṃ carati /  tasmānmātṛsaṃjñā pitṛsaṃjñā putrasaṃjñā duhitṛsaṃjñā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvānāmantike yāvadātmasaṃjñā utpādayitavyā /  yathā ātmā sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvaduḥkhebhyo mocayitavyaḥ,

tgt_original: 作是行者，為忍勤苦行。

tgt_original: 」舍利弗謂須菩提： 「菩薩無所生，菩薩法亦無所生。

src_original: bodhisattvadharmā apyanutpādaḥ,  sarvajñatāpyanutpādaḥ,  sarvajñatādharmā apyanutpādaḥ,  nāpyanutpannena dharmeṇa anutpannā prāptiḥ prāpyate /

tgt_original: 」賢者阿難亦爾。 須菩提報諸比丘言： 「阿惟越致菩薩當受是法。 若成就阿羅漢者，復有是法，無有持者。

src_original: (Vaidya 155) gambhīracaryeyaṃ śāriputra yaduta yathatā /
tgt_original: 「如是，本無實甚深。

src_original: asmin khalu punastathatānirdeśe nirdiśyamāne trayāṇāṃ bhikṣuśatānāmanupādāyāsravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni,  pañcānāṃ ca bhikṣuṇīśatānāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurviśuddham,  pañcabhiś ca devaputrasahasraiḥ pūrvaparikarmakṛtairanutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā,
tgt_original: 」說本無時，三百比丘皆得阿羅漢，五百比丘尼皆得須陀洹道，五百諸天及人悉逮得無所從生法樂忍，六十菩薩皆得阿羅漢道。

src_original: ṣaṣṭeś ca bodhisattvānāmanupādāyāsravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni //  atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputrasteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmanupādāyāsravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni  viditvā bhagavantametadavocat - ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yadeteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmanupādāyāsravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni?  bhagavānāha - etaiḥ śāriputra bodhisattvaiḥ pañcabuddhaśatāni paryupāsitāni,
tgt_original: 佛語舍利弗：

src_original: sarvatra ca dānaṃ dattaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣityaṃ kṣāntyā saṃpāditaṃ vīryamārabdhaṃ dhyānānyutpāditāni /  te khalu punarime prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhītā upāyakauśalyena ca virahitā abhūvan /  kiṃcāpi śāriputra eteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmasti mārgaḥ śūnyatā vā ānimittacaryā vā apraṇihitamanasikāratā vā,  śrāvakabhūmau nirjātāḥ,  na buddhabhūmau /
tgt_original: 「是輩菩薩供養過去五百佛已，皆作施與，護於淨戒，成於忍辱，所作精進，定足於禪，以不得般若波羅蜜漚和拘舍羅，雖是菩薩摩訶薩有道意入空、無相、無願，離於漚和拘舍羅者，便中道為本際作證得聲聞。
